{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.23915v1", "title": "GBDT, multiplicative integrals and linear similarity", "summary": "A GBDT version of the B\"acklund-Darboux transformation for a non-isospectral
canonical system is considered. Applications to multiplicative integrals and
their limit values, to characteristic matrix functions and to linear similarity
problems are obtained. Some interesting examples are constructed as well.", "main_category": "math.CA", "categories": "math.CA,math.FA,math.SP", "published": "2025-03-31T10:06:48Z"}
